com.github.anno4j.querying

Class QueryService<T extends Annotation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.anno4j.querying.QueryService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class QueryService<T extends Annotation>
extends Object
    The QueryService allows to query the MICO triple stores by using criteria. Furthermore this is provided by simple classes. This is why the user does not need to write SPARQL queries by himself.
    Author:
    Andreas Eisenkolb

      • setBodyCriteria

        public QueryService setBodyCriteria(String ldpath,
                           String value)
        Setting a criteria for filtering eu.mico.platform.persistence.impl.BodyImpl.* objects. Compared to the other setBodyCriteria function, this function does not need a Comparison statement. Hence, the Comparison.EQ statement ("=") will be used automatically.
        Parameters:
        ldpath - Syntax similar to XPath. Beginning from the Body object
        value - The constraint value
        Returns:
        itself to allow chaining.
